query.queryinfo: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [System.NodeName], [System.AreaPath], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [System.CreatedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\XR\08_Loutang\Software' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] IN (0, 1) AND ( [System.NodeName] IN ('3D', 'Filming', 'MainFrame', 'PA', 'PR', 'Ref', 'RenderServer', 'Review') OR ( [System.NodeName] = 'Exam' AND ( [System.AssignedTo] IN ('jihong.li_HSW-GS', 'huan.yu_HSW-GS', 'lei.zhang05_HSW-GS', 'zongli.chen_HSW-GS') OR [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy] IN ('ruixin.zhao_HSW-GS (UNITED-IMAGING\ruixin.zhao)', 'jihong.li_HSW-GS', 'huan.yu_HSW-GS', 'lei.zhang05_HSW-GS', 'zongli.chen_HSW-GS') ))) AND [UI.Reserved] NOT CONTAINS '临床后' AND [UI.Reserved] NOT CONTAINS '[临床不解]' ORDER BY [System.State], [System.NodeName], [System.AssignedTo] desc

SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.NodeName], [XR.UModule], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.CreatedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.FinishDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StartDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.StackRank], [System.IterationPath], [UI.Module], [XR.UAttribute], [XR.Requirement.PanGuSSFS], [XR.UStatus], [XR.URecords], [XR.URemark], [System.AreaPath], [System.CreatedBy], [System.ChangedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'XR_Loutang' AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'User Requirement' AND [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'XR_LouTang\User Requirement\PRODM\SW' AND [XR.UAttribute] IN ('1-CMTC', '2-临床') AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.FinishDate] < @today AND [System.State] IN ('10-Requirement', '20-Solution', '30-Development') AND [System.NodeName] IN ('3D', 'Review', 'Ref', 'PA', 'PR', 'Filming', 'Archiving', 'MainFrame') AND [System.IterationPath] IN ('XR_LouTang\V0.6', 'XR_LouTang\V0.5', 'XR_LouTang\V0.4', 'XR_LouTang\V0.3', 'XR_LouTang\V0.2', 'XR_LouTang\V0.1') ORDER BY [XR.UModule] desc

SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [System.NodeName], [System.AreaPath], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [System.CreatedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\XR\08_Loutang\Software' AND ( [System.NodeName] IN ('3D', 'Review', 'Ref', 'PA', 'PR', 'Filming', 'Archiving', 'MainFrame', 'RenderServer') OR ( [System.NodeName] = 'Exam' AND [System.AssignedTo] IN ('jihong.li_HSW-GS', 'lei.zhang05_HSW-GS', 'huan.yu_HSW-GS', 'zongli.chen_HSW-GS') )) AND [System.State] IN ('New', 'Assigned') AND [UI.Reserved] NOT CONTAINS '临床后' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [UI.Reserved] CONTAINS '[临床必解]' AND ( [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] = '' OR [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] > '2021-08-21T00:00:00.0000000' OR [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] < @today ) ORDER BY [System.State], [System.NodeName], [System.AssignedTo] desc

SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [System.NodeName], [System.AreaPath], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [System.CreatedBy], [System.CreatedDate] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\XR\08_Loutang\Software' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [System.CreatedDate] >= @today AND ( [System.NodeName] IN ('3D', 'Filming', 'MainFrame', 'PA', 'PR', 'Ref', 'RenderServer', 'Review') OR ( [System.NodeName] = 'Exam' AND ( [System.AssignedTo] IN ('jihong.li_HSW-GS', 'huan.yu_HSW-GS', 'lei.zhang05_HSW-GS', 'zongli.chen_HSW-GS') OR [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy] IN ('ruixin.zhao_HSW-GS (UNITED-IMAGING\ruixin.zhao)', 'jihong.li_HSW-GS', 'huan.yu_HSW-GS', 'lei.zhang05_HSW-GS', 'zongli.chen_HSW-GS') ))) ORDER BY [System.State], [System.AssignedTo], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority]
query.additionalqueryinfo: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [System.NodeName], [System.AreaPath], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [System.CreatedBy], [System.CreatedDate] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\XR\08_Loutang\Software' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate] >= @today AND [System.State] IN ('Resolved', 'Verified', 'Closed', 'Terminated') AND ( [System.NodeName] IN ('3D', 'Filming', 'MainFrame', 'PA', 'PR', 'Ref', 'RenderServer', 'Review') OR ( [System.NodeName] = 'Exam' AND ( [System.AssignedTo] IN ('jihong.li_HSW-GS', 'huan.yu_HSW-GS', 'lei.zhang05_HSW-GS', 'zongli.chen_HSW-GS') OR [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy] IN ('ruixin.zhao_HSW-GS (UNITED-IMAGING\ruixin.zhao)', 'jihong.li_HSW-GS', 'huan.yu_HSW-GS', 'lei.zhang05_HSW-GS', 'zongli.chen_HSW-GS') ))) ORDER BY [System.State], [System.AssignedTo], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority]

query.queryinfo: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.NodeName], [XR.UModule], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.CreatedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.FinishDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.StartDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.StackRank], [System.IterationPath], [UI.Module], [XR.UAttribute], [XR.Requirement.PanGuSSFS], [XR.UStatus], [XR.URecords], [XR.URemark], [System.AreaPath], [System.CreatedBy], [System.ChangedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'XR_Loutang' AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'User Requirement' AND [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'XR_LouTang\User Requirement\PRODM\SW' AND [System.State] IN ('35-Resolved', '40-SSIT Done', '50-SI', '60-SIT', '70-ST') AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate] >= @today AND [System.NodeName] IN ('3D', 'Review', 'Ref', 'PA', 'PR', 'Filming', 'Archiving', 'MainFrame') AND [System.IterationPath] UNDER 'XR_LouTang\V0.6' ORDER BY [XR.UModule] desc
